title: For Sale:  N172 Old Judge 2-Player poses
author: Archive

posts.post_title: For Sale:  N172 Old Judge 2-Player poses
posts.post_content:
Posted By: David Seaborn
I was the winner of lot from the latest Mastro auction featuring Old Judges with 2-player poses.  There are a few cards that I do not need and can offer for sale, including two Hall-of-Famer cards.  Prices are:

Clark/Hughes - SOLD
Ewing/Mascot - $1,250 (Mastro stated slight trim)
Keefe/Richardson - $1,400
Kelly/Umpire - $800 (Mastro stated this was rebacked)

Please contact me (oldorioles@aol.com) if interested.  Thanks, Dave
